source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000010_SOULEATER<tab>My feast...must not end... My feast...must not be interrupted!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000010_SOULEATER<tab>魂ヲ―― アツメル――
ワガ  シメイ  ジャマハサセナイ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000015_SOULEATER<tab>My feast...must not end... My feast...must not be interrupted!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000015_SOULEATER<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000020_PANDAEMONIUM<tab>I am...Pandæmonium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000020_PANDAEMONIUM<tab>我が名は―― パンデモニウム

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000030_PANDAEMONIUM<tab>From countless failures have I wrought miracles. Into soulless vessels, I breathe life!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000030_PANDAEMONIUM<tab>万を超えし  失敗作の果て――
魂なき器に  生命宿りし殿堂なり！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000040_THEMIS<tab>I suppose I have Athena to thank for this incarnation. I have long considered how I might stand against you, I admit.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000040_THEMIS<tab>この高揚は  アテナに仕向けられたものだろうか――
君との戦いにふさわしい姿を  ずっと考えていた――！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000050_THEMIS<tab>In transformation I present to you my truth. I am Elidibus!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000050_THEMIS<tab>私のすべてを  君に見せよう
これが  私の転身だ――！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000060_ATHENA<tab>You have done well to reach the seat of godhood. Now, bare your souls to me!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000060_ATHENA<tab>神の御座へ  ようこそ――
さあ  貴方のすべてを  見せてちょうだい

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000070_THEMIS<tab>...I see. Then Hephaistos's story has been laid bare.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000070_THEMIS<tab>……なるほど。
ヘファイストスにまつわる顛末がわかったと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000080_THEMIS<tab>As has the nature of our mysterious crystal. The questions which led us into Pandæmonium are answered, and soon order shall be restored.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000080_THEMIS<tab>今しがた、記憶のクリスタルの真相も明らかになったことだ。
パンデモニウムの騒動は、いよいよ終結と言えるだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000090_THEMIS<tab>I, too, can fade away, unburdened by regret. I could not have reached this point without you, friend.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000090_THEMIS<tab>私も、何ひとつ思い残すことなく消え去ることができる。
ここへ至らせてくれた君には、本当に感謝しているよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000100_THEMIS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000100_THEMIS<tab>フッ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000110_THEMIS<tab>So many revelations, but there are more, if you would dig a little deeper.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000110_THEMIS<tab>せっかくだ、解かなくてもいい謎も解いていくかい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000120_THEMIS<tab>Elidibus's soul was plucked from the aetherial sea, and from it I was wrought. Surely you have a passing interest in what I remember. In what I feel...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000120_THEMIS<tab>この星海に漂うエリディブスの魂から創られた私が、
何を記憶していて、本当はどう思っているのか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000130_THEMIS<tab>You deserve what answers I can provide. While my memories of Pandæmonium are clear, all else is...hazy at best.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000130_THEMIS<tab>正直に白状しよう。
パンデモニウムについては記憶が補強されているようだが、
それ以外は、あらゆることが穴だらけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000140_THEMIS<tab>Perhaps Athena made me this way, or...perhaps it is the result of who or what I was before.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000140_THEMIS<tab>アテナの創り方による影響もあるだろうが……
「私」はもう、記憶が保持できなくなっていたのだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000150_THEMIS<tab>Still, I can recall vague figures. Scenes from my future, and your past...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000150_THEMIS<tab>ただ、おぼろげには思い出せるよ。
君にとっては過去の、私にとっては未来の光景を……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000160_THEMIS<tab>At the Crystal Tower's peak we clash. And later, from that selfsame spire, I send you forth...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000160_THEMIS<tab>水晶の塔の頂きで、君と私は相対する。
そして、同じ場所から君を送り出すんだ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000170_THEMIS<tab>Into our age. Into Elpis.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000170_THEMIS<tab>私たちの時代へ……エルピスへ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000180_THEMIS<tab>Why do I decide on such a course? Formless as these images are, I cannot say...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000180_THEMIS<tab>どうしてそうしようと思いついたのか、
影法師には、正しいところはわからない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000190_THEMIS<tab>...However, I can hazard a guess.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000190_THEMIS<tab>……が、推測を立てることはできる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000200_THEMIS<tab>Somewhere within my fragmented memories, I catch a glimpse of our journey into Pandæmonium.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000200_THEMIS<tab>「私」は欠けた記憶のどこかで、
君とパンデモニウムに挑んだことを覚えていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000210_THEMIS<tab>A glimpse which shows not the path we took or the destination where it led us, yet by its very presence demands that you are required in Elpis.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000210_THEMIS<tab>その姿を忘れ、経緯を忘れ、結末を忘れていたとしても……
ほんのひと欠片残った事実が、
君はエルピスに行くべきだと「私」に思わせたんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000220_THEMIS<tab>And even if that act is but one link in the chain of events which ends in Etheirys's salvation...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000220_THEMIS<tab>そうして君をエルピスに送ったことが、
アーテリスを救うことに繋がったというのなら……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000230_THEMIS<tab>Then this all has meaning. Our time together─every moment─is worthwhile...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000230_THEMIS<tab>無駄じゃなかったよ。
君と<var 4A ((テミス)) ((わたし)) /var>が共に戦ったことは……何ひとつとして。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000235_THEMIS<tab>...and I am unburdened by regret.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000235_THEMIS<tab>なら、恨むも何もないだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000240_THEMIS<tab>That said, it is possible my motivations become something else entirely.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000240_THEMIS<tab>まあ、当の「私」の魂は、違う考えかもしれないけれどね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000250_THEMIS<tab>That you would cross this vast expanse in the hopes of being reunited with your allies...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000250_THEMIS<tab>同胞たちとの再会が果たせるよう、
苦労してこちらの海まで渡ってきたようだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000260_THEMIS<tab>A devotion that once would have baffled me. But after having been to the depths of that twisted prison and back, I think I can understand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000260_THEMIS<tab>テミスとしては理解しがたい執着だが……
そういう想いがあるというのも、
万魔殿の深層を見た今ならば、認められる気がするよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000270_THEMIS<tab>Now, I have pulled back the curtain as far as I dare.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000270_THEMIS<tab>さて、これ以上幕引きを伸ばすのは野暮というものだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000280_THEMIS<tab>The people of your age call this the aetherial sea─a name I quite enjoy. For it teems with life, each star a soul on its journey.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000280_THEMIS<tab>今の時代に、冥界が星海と呼ばれているのは気に入った。
ここに煌めく星々すべてが、それぞれの生命だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000290_THEMIS<tab>And among these uncountable stars, it was yours that crossed my path. For that I shall be forever grateful.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000290_THEMIS<tab>数多の星のどれでもない。
君という星が私の前に現れたことを、幸福に思う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000300_THEMIS<tab>I wish you well on your journey. A journey as long as your star is bright─a journey not bound by the confines of this world, or any other.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000300_THEMIS<tab>どうかこれからも、この世界すら超え、思うがまま飛び給え。
遥か彼方を目指す、ほうき星の如く……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000310_ELIDIBUS<tab>How fascinating, the truths that dwell at the edge of sleep.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000310_ELIDIBUS<tab>――最後までわからないものだな
眠りの縁で  こんな真実に出会おうとは

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000320_ELIDIBUS<tab>The course of history is set by its victors. It is immutable. And yet...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000320_ELIDIBUS<tab>歴史は覆らない
勝者の道だけが続いていくが  しかし――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000330_ELIDIBUS<tab>Should this star continue upon its path...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000330_ELIDIBUS<tab>この星が  こうして続いていくならば――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000340_ELIDIBUS<tab>Look...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000340_ELIDIBUS<tab>ああ――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000350_ELIDIBUS<tab>The light...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000350_ELIDIBUS<tab>光だ――
